    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)

    • changeSceneMethod

      public void changeSceneMethod​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, java.lang.String url, java.lang.String controller, Model.Part selectedPart, Product selectedProduct) throws java.io.IOException
      Method used to easily change scenes.
      Parameters:
      event - the button press.
      url - the location of the fxml file for the controller.
      controller - the name of the controller.
      selectedPart - passes data to the modify part controller.
      selectedProduct - passes data to the modify product controller.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - handles exceptions.

    • partEntryValidator

      public boolean partEntryValidator​(javafx.scene.control.TextField nameTextField, javafx.scene.control.TextField priceTextField, javafx.scene.control.TextField inventoryTextField, javafx.scene.control.TextField minTextField, javafx.scene.control.TextField maxTextField)
      Validates part and product data entry to make sure it's all logical.
      Parameters:
      nameTextField - the name of the item.
      priceTextField - the price of the item.
      inventoryTextField - the stock of the item.
      minTextField - the minimum amount in stock.
      maxTextField - the maximum amount in stock.
      Returns:
      true if the data checks out.

    • generateNewID

      public static int generateNewID​(int[] id, int size)
      Uses all known IDs as well as the current amount of parts or products to calculate a unique ID number for a new item.
      Parameters:
      id - an array of all the existing part or product id's
      size - the total number of all parts or products.
      Returns:
      unique, generated Model.Part or Product ID for creation.
